urls.title: Conditions of carriage
urls.description: In these General Conditions of Carriage, hereinafter referred to as “Conditions”, except where the context otherwise requires or where it is otherwise expressly provided, the following definitions apply: “Agreed Stopping Places”, for the purposes of the Convention and of these Conditions, (which may be altered by Carrier in accordance with Article 10) means those places, except the place of departure and the place of destination, set forth in the ticket or as shown in Carrier’s timetables as scheduled

data.text: @KarmaRose11 Hi there, if we may share, an arrival terminal will be assigned approximately two hours before the flight lands. Singapore Airlines flights may arrive at Terminal 1, 2 or 3. You may wish to refer to https://t.co/RqsIs3Ch1m for details on your flight status. Thank you.

urls.title: Scheduled maintenance on singaporeair.com
urls.description: Our website will be undergoing scheduled maintenance o n 13 July 2022, Wednesday- 0000hrs to 0400hrs SGT (12 July 2022, from 1600hrs to 2000hrs GMT). During this period, our website will be temporarily unavailable. Please visit our website again later to book or make changes to your flight(s). We apologise for any inconvenience

data.text: @lame_tweety Hi there, if you travelled on a Singapore Airlines flight, the ticket number beginning with 618 would be indicated at the bottom of your boarding pass. Alternatively, you may wish to email our KrisFlyer colleagues kf_contact@singaporeair.com.sg for them to assist you. Thank you.
